SEARCH
Package com.ubicua.didas.rest

Class CustomAdminClientRoleResourceProviderFactory

java.lang.Object
com.ubicua.didas.rest.CustomAdminClientRoleResourceProviderFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.keycloak.provider.ProviderFactory<org.keycloak.services.resources.admin.ext.AdminRealmResourceProvider>, org.keycloak.services.resources.admin.ext.AdminRealmResourceProviderFactory
public class CustomAdminClientRoleResourceProviderFactory extends Object implements org.keycloak.services.resources.admin.ext.AdminRealmResourceProviderFactory
Factory for the Custom Admin Client Role Resource Provider.

Registers an API endpoint under the ID "didas-admin-client-role-update" for managing client role updates via Keycloak's Admin REST extension.

Lifecycle

  • create(KeycloakSession) – instantiates the provider.
  • init(org.keycloak.Config.Scope) and postInit(org.keycloak.models.KeycloakSessionFactory) – no-op hooks for startup customization.
  • close() – cleanup hook (no resources to release).
Author:
Ivan Kuchumov
